  • class M3Creator

Detailed Description

Objects of sub classes to this class is used to group other items.

This is a very powerful way of grouping items, so it must be used with care. One example of grouping is StreetItem, that groups StreetSegmentItems into, what a human calls, streets. An other example is ZipCodeItem that groups a lot of StreetSegmentItems that have the same zip code.
